title: Dragon of Legend: A New Era
description: More than four hundred years have passed since the defeat of the Lands's greatest threat, Haiden. With the future looking brighter than ever before, things could only get better.At least, that's what it should be.As the power of the Council grows stronger with each passing day, so did the increasing number of blatant corruption and lies as the bond between mankind and dragons no longer exists.With things slowly turning for the worse, can help from a time once forgotten provide a new hope for the Resistance?A new chapter begins . . .
author: Angelika Meyer
